== Main Inclusion Report for Guidance ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** Available in universe, all platforms
 0. ''Rationale:''  
** guidance is a new set of configuration tools for KDE, they are better maintained than existing alternatives e.g. KUser <nowiki>[[MainInclusionKDEGuidance]]</nowiki>.  Guidance has recently been put into KDE's SVN and will likely be released with future versions of KDE.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues.
** These programs do need to be run as root
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** No outstanding bugs
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard debhelper packaging with custom install rules to ensure policy compliance
** Build-system is a custom script
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** libpythonize from pykdeextensions <nowiki>[[MainInclustionPyKDEExtensions]]</nowiki>, python-qt3/python-kde3/python-sip4-dev, all of which have been in main previously but moved out because they were unused

== Reviewers ==
MartinPitt: no idea about the robustness, but Jonathan deemed it ok. Approved.
